field.name: Open Field
field.description: You are standing in an open field west of a white house, with a boarded front door. There is a small mailbox here.

house.name: White House
house.description: You are facing the south side of a white house. There is no door here, and all the windows are boarded up. To the north a narrow path winds alongside the house.

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: You are in a forest, with trees in all directions. To the east, there appears to be sunlight filtering through the canopy.

clearing.name: Forest Clearing
clearing.description: You are in a small clearing in the dense forest. The trees form a natural circle around this peaceful spot. Sunlight streams down from above, illuminating ancient stone ruins.

garden.name: Garden
garden.description: You are in a small garden behind the white house. A well-worn path leads north to the house. The garden is overgrown but still beautiful, with wild flowers everywhere.

path.name: Narrow Path
path.description: You are on a narrow path on the north side of the house. The path leads west around the house and east to a wooden door. The door appears to be unlocked.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: You are in the kitchen of the white house. A table sits in the middle of the room, covered with dust. To the east is a dark hallway.

hallway.name: Dark Hallway
hallway.description: You are in a dark hallway. It is too dark to see anything clearly. You can feel walls on both sides and sense that the hallway continues to the east.

living_room.name: Living Room
living_room.description: You are in a comfortable living room. There are chairs and a sofa here, covered with dust sheets. A large treasure chest sits prominently in the center of the room.

cave.name: Underground Cave
cave.description: You are in a small underground cave beneath the forest clearing. The cave is dimly lit by phosphorescent moss on the walls. Strange symbols are carved into the rock.
